name: Masiki a saving spirit
description:
This is the gamejam version of Masiki a saving spirit for #SoloCodeJam

Story

The spirit world is in trouble. The world stele which maintains the life on each island has been strangely split and all the spirits have been caught in an other dimension.

You are the last one who can collect all the fragments to rebuild the world stele and free all the spirits !

Features
  • An adventure in 3d  with an original integration of 2D in 3D world.
  • Unique graphics and musics.
  • 7 islands to explore (5 in the gamejam ver.) with unique mechanics on each.
  • 7 fragments to get to rebuild the entire world (5 in the gamejam ver.)
  • Explore the 2d dimension to free all the spirits!
Credits ProgrammerDeakcorGraphic designer 2DPalonaGraphic designer 3DLe GlobuleSound designerKayugames
